title: Sample Project Estimation
description: A sample project demonstrating the JSON estimator format with multiple phases and tasks.

phases.objective: Initialize project structure and development environment

tasks2.title: Project Initialization
tasks2.description: Set up the initial project structure with configuration files, dependencies, and development tooling.
acceptanceCriteria: All configuration files are created and valid

tasks2.title: CI/CD Pipeline Setup
tasks2.description: Configure continuous integration and deployment pipelines for automated testing and deployment.
acceptanceCriteria: CI pipeline runs on every push
Deployment triggers on main branch merge
